metadata.title: CVE-2024-36976 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Revert "media: v4l2-ctrls: show all owned controls in log_status"This reverts commit 9801b5b28c6929139d6fceeee8d739cc67bb2739.This patch introduced a potential deadlock scenario:[Wed May  8 10:02:06 2024]  Possible unsafe locking scenario:[Wed May  8 10:02:06 2024]        CPU0                    CPU1[Wed May  8 10:02:06 2024]        ----                    ----[Wed May  8 10:02:06 2024]   lock(vivid_ctrls:1620:(hdl_vid_cap)->_lock);[Wed May  8 10:02:06 2024]lock(vivid_ctrls:1608:(hdl_user_vid)->_lock);[Wed May  8 10:02:06 2024]lock(vivid_ctrls:1620:(hdl_vid_cap)->_lock);[Wed May  8 10:02:06 2024]   lock(vivid_ctrls:1608:(hdl_user_vid)->_lock);For now just revert.
